SA15bsa0553u:3: yatsattat kṣaṇikaṃ yathā ghaṭaḥ santaścāmīvivādāspadībhūtāḥ padārthā iti svabhāvo hetuḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:9: na punaḥ kāraṇagatau kāryyagatau vā kramākramāvasya vyāpakau /
SA15bsa0553u:12: tasmāt kāraṇagatayā kramākramikāryyaviṣayatayā vyāpyamānā kāraṇaśaktiḥ kramākramavyāptetyucyate /
SA15bsa0553u:15: tataśca yadyapi sarvvatra kramākramau sattvasya vyāpakāvityādyucyate /
SA15bsa0553u:22: kaḥ punarasau vyāptiprasādhako vyāpakānupalambha iti cet /
SA15bsa0553u:27: nāsti ca nityābhimatasya bhāvasya kramākramikāryyaviṣayatvamiti vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:29: nityasya dharmmiṇaḥ kramākramikāryyaviṣayatvena vyāpakena saha virodhasadbhāvāt,
SA15bsa0553u:30: tathā hi pūrvvāparakālayorekatve nityatvaṃ kṣaṇadvayepi bhede kramākramitvaṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:37: tathā hi na tāvat kramākramābhyāmanyaḥ prakārosti,
SA15bsa0553u:47: tathāhi na tāvadayaṃ prasaṅgo hetuḥ sādhyadharmmiṇi pramāṇasidvatvāt,
SA15bsa0553u:53: pratīti rhi pratyakṣeṇānumānena vikalpamātreṇa vā syāt /
SA15bsa0553u:54: prathamapakṣadvaye sākṣātpāramparyyeṇa vā svapratītilakṣaṇārthakāritve maulaḥ sādhāraṇo hetuḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:57: antimapakṣe tu na kaścidveturanāśrayaḥ syāt vikalpamātrasidvasya dharmmiṇaḥ sarvvatra sulabhatvāt /
SA15bsa0553u:58: api ca tat kalpanājñānaṃ pratyakṣapṛṣṭhabhāvi vā syāt,
SA15bsa0553u:67: pañcame ca tadviṣayasyābhāvo na tāvat pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati /
SA15bsa0553u:88: ataḥ prathamakāla evāśe ṣāṇi kāryyāṇi kuryyāditi cet /
SA15bsa0553u:95: taccāsya svarūpaṃ tṛtīyādiṣviva kṣaṇeṣu dvitīye 'pi kṣaṇe saditi tadāpi janayet /
SA15bsa0553u:99: atrocyate / satyaṃ svarūpeṇa kāryyañjanayati na tu tenaiva /
SA15bsa0553u:104: ye hi kāryyamutpāditavanto dravyaviśeṣāsteṣāṃ vyāpārasya niyatakāryyotpādanasamarthasya niṣpādite kāryye 'nuvarttamāneṣvapi teṣu dravyeṣu nivṛttārthādūnā sāmagrī jāyate /
SA15bsa0553u:106: na hi daṇḍādayaḥ svabhāvenaiva karttāro yenāmī niṣpatterārabhya kāryyaṃ vidadyuḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:108: na ceyatā svarūpeṇa na karttāraḥ svarūpakārakatvanirvvāhaparatayā vyāpārasamāveśāditi //
SA15bsa0553u:109: kiñca kramākramābhāvaśca bhaviṣyati na ca satvābhāva iti sandigdhavyatirekopyayaṃ vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:113: adṛśyatve tu nāsattāniścayo viprakarṣiṇāmiti na kramākramābhyāmarthakriyāsāmarthyasya vyāptisidviḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:115: kiñca dṛśyādṛśyasahakāripratyayasākalyavataḥ kramayaugapadyasyātyantaparokṣatvāt tena vyāptaṃ sattvamapi parokṣameveti na tāvatpratibandhaḥ pratyakṣataḥ sidhyati nāpyanumānataḥ,
SA15bsa0553u:120: kramākramābhyāṃ vyāptamiti tu brūvata vyāpterevābhāvaḥ pradarśito bhavati /
SA15bsa0553u:124: api ca kimidaṃ vādhakamakṣaṇikānāmasattāṃ sādha yati,
SA15bsa0553u:132: sā ca yadi pratyakṣeṇa pratīyate tadā tadvetuḥ syāditi sattvamanaikāntikaṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:135: tadā pūrvvoktakrameṇa pañcadhā vikalpya vikalpyo dūṣaṇīyaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:139: na ca svabhāvānupalambhe vyāpakānupalambhaḥ kasyacit dṛśyasya pratipattimantareṇāntarbhāvayituṃ śakya iti /
SA15bsa0553u:147: yathā tuhinadahanayoḥ sāpekṣadhruvabhāvayośca pratiyogī cākṣaṇikaḥ pratīyamānaḥ pratītikāritvāt sanneva syāt ajanakasyāprameyatvāt /
SA15bsa0553u:153: tatra kiṃ virodho vāstavaḥ kālpaniko vā /
SA15bsa0553u:157: na tarhi sattvasya vyatirekaḥ pāramārthika iti kṣaṇabhaṅgo dattajalāñjaliriti /
SA15bsa0553u:160: hetoḥ svānubhavasya cākṣatirataḥ kṣiptaḥ sapakṣo 'pi ca /
SA15bsa0553u:161: śūnyaśca dvitīyena sidhyati na cāsattāpi sattā yathā no nityena virodhasidvirasatā śakyā kramāderapīti //
SA15bsa0553u:162: atrocyate / iha vastunyapi dharmmidharmmavyavahāro dṛṣṭoyathā gavi gotvaṃ,
SA15bsa0553u:164: avastunyapi dharmmidharmmavyavahāro dṛṣṭo yathā śaśaviṣāṇe tīkṣṇatvābhāvo bandhyāputre vakratvābhāvo gagaṇāravinde gandhābhāva ityādi /
SA15bsa0553u:174: yenaiva hi vacanenāvastuno dharmmitvābhāvena dharmmeṇa dharmmatvamabhyupagataṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:176: tathāhyavastuno dharmmitvannāstīti vacanena dharmmitvābhāvaḥ kimavastu vidhīyate,
SA15bsa0553u:183: tṛtīyastu pakṣo vyartha eva nirāśrayatvāt iti kathamavastuno dharmmitvaniṣedhaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:186: tathāvastuno dharmmitvaṃ nāstīti vacanopanyāso 'vastuno dharmmitvasvīkārapūrvvatvena vyāptaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:191: tadā vyāpyasyāpi vacanopanyāsasyāsambhava iti mūkataivātra balādāyāteti kathaṃ na svavacanavirodhasidviḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:193: bruvan vā doṣamimaṃ pariharttumiti mahati saṅkaṭe praveśaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:194: avastuprastāve sahṛdayāṇāṃ mūkataiva yujyata iti cet /
SA15bsa0553u:196: avastuprastāve svayameva yathāśakti valgitvā bhagno mūkataiva nyāyaprāpteti paribhāṣayā niḥsarttumicchati /
SA15bsa0553u:197: nacāvastuprastāvo rājadaṇḍena vinā caraṇamarddanādināniṣṭimātreṇa vā pratiṣedvuṃ śakyate /
SA15bsa0553u:198: tataścātrāpi kramākramābhāvasya sādhanatve sattvābhāvasya ca sādhyatve sandigdhavastubhāvasyāvastyātmano vā kṣaṇikasya dharmmitvaṃ kena pratihanyate /
SA15bsa0553u:199: trividho hi dharmmo dṛṣṭaḥ kaścidvastuniyato nīlādiḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:208: kevalamasau vyavahārāṅgabhūtā pratīti rvastvavastunorekarūpā na bhavati /
SA15bsa0553u:212: vastuno hi vastubalabhāvinī pratīti ryathāsākṣātpratyakṣaṃ paramparayā tatpṛṣṭhabhāvī vikalpo 'numānañca /
SA15bsa0553u:215: nahyabhāvaḥ kaścidvigrahavān yaḥ sākṣātkarttavyo 'pi tu vyavaharttavyaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:219: tataścākṣaṇikasya vikalpamātrasidvatve yaduktaṃ na kaścidveturanāśrayaḥ syadvikalpamātrasidvasya dharmmiṇaḥ sarvvatra sulabhatvāditi tatasaṅgataṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:220: vikalpamātrasidvasya dharmmiṇaḥ sarvvatra sambhave 'pi vastudharmmeṇa dharmmitvāyogāt /
SA15bsa0553u:237: tathā hi yadi tasya prathame kṣaṇe dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvikāryyakāraṇasāmarthyamasti tadā prathamakṣaṇabhāvikāryyavat dvitīyādikṣaṇabhāvyapi kāryyaṃ kuryyāt /
SA15bsa0553u:241: na hi bhāvaḥ svarūpeṇa karotīti svarūpeṇaiva karoti /
SA15bsa0553u:243: yadā tāvadamī mīlitāḥ santaḥ kāryyaṃ kurvvate tadaikārthakaraṇalakṣaṇaṃ sahakāritvameṣāmastu ko ni ṣedvā /
SA15bsa0553u:249: dṛśyatāṃ kintu pūrvvasthitādeva paścāt sāmagrīmadhyapraviṣṭādbhāvāt kāryyotpattiranyasmādeva viśiṣṭasāmagrīsamutpannāt kṣaṇāditi vivādapadametat /
SA15bsa0553u:250: tatra prāgapi sambhave sarvvadaiva kāryyotpatte rnavā kadācidapīti virodhamasamādhāya tata eva kāryyotpattiriti sādhyānuvādamātrapravṛttaḥ kṛpāmarhati /
SA15bsa0553u:253: vistareṇa ca pratyabhijñānadūṣaṇamasmābhiḥ sthirasidvidūṣaṇe pratipāditamiti tata evāvadhāryyaṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:258: bhavatu tāvannijāgantukabhedena dvividhaṃ sāmarthyaṃ tathāpi tatprātisvikaṃ vastusvalakṣaṇaṃ sadyaḥ kriyādharmmakamavaśyābhyupagantavyam /
SA15bsa0553u:262: na ca kāryyaṃ sahakāriṇo 'pekṣata iti yuktaṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:264: hetuśca sannapi yadi svakāryyannakaroti tadā tatkāryyameva tanna syāt,
SA15bsa0553u:273: kiṃ kurmma uttarakālameva tasya janmeti cet /
SA15bsa0553u:275: śthiratve 'pyeṣa eva svabhāvastasya yaduttarakṣaṇa eva kāryyaṃ karotīti cet / na /
SA15bsa0553u:280: kāryye niṣpanne tadviṣayavyāpārābhāvādūnā sāmagrī na niṣpāditaṃ niṣpādayediti cet / na /
SA15bsa0553u:282: sāmagrīsambhavāsambhavayorapi sadyaḥ kriyākārakasvarūpasambhave janakatvamavāryyamiti prāgeva pratipādanāt /
SA15bsa0553u:283: kāryyasya hi niṣpāditatvāt punaḥ karttumaśakyatvameva kāraṇamasamarthamāvedayati /
SA15bsa0553u:285: na ca kramākramābhyāmaparaprakārasambhavo yena tābhyāmavyāptau sandigdhavyatireko hetuḥ syāt /
SA15bsa0553u:290: tathātīndriyasya sahakāriṇo 'dṛśyatvepyayogavyavacchedena dṛśyasahakārisahitasya dṛśyasyaiva sattvasya dṛśyakramākramābhyāṃ vyāptiḥ pratyakṣādeva sidhyati /
SA15bsa0553u:291: evaṃ kramākramābhyāmarthakriyākāritvaṃ byāptamiti kramākramayoranyo 'nyavyavacchedena sthitatvādetatprakāradvayaparihāreṇārthakriyākāritvamanyatra na gatamityarthaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:295: nahyabhāvaḥ kaścit vigrahavān yaḥ sākṣātkarttavyo 'pi tu vikalpādeva vyavaharttavyaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:297: evaṃ vaidharmmyadṛṣṭāntasya hetuvyatirekasya ca vikalpādeva pratītiḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:301: sattvasya tato vyatirekaṃ kṣaṇikatvena vyāptiñca sādhayatyekavyāpārātmakatvāt iti sthitaṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:302: nanu vyāpakānupalabdhiriti yadyanupalabdhimātrantadā na tasya sādhyabudvijanakatvamavastutvāt /
SA15bsa0553u:303: na cānyopalabdhirvyāpakānupalabdhirabhidhātuṃ śakyā bhūtalādivat anyasya kasyacidanupalabdheriti cet tadasaṅgataṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:305: yathā neha śiṃśapā vṛkṣābhāvādityatra vṛkṣāpekṣayā kevalapradeśasya dharmmiṇa upalabdhirdṛśyānupalabdhiḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:306: śiṃśapāpekṣayā ca kevalapradeśasya dharmmiṇa upalabdhireva śiṃśapābhāvopalabdhiriti svabhāvahetuparyyavasāyivyāpāro vyāpakānupalambhaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:307: tathā hi nityasya dharmmiṇo vikalpabudvyadhyavasi tasya kramikāritvākramikāritvāpekṣayā kevalagrahaṇameva kramikāritvā kramikāritvānupalambha arthakriyāpekṣayā ca /
SA15bsa0553u:316: ayañca nyāyo yathā vastubhūte dharmmiṇi tathāvastubhūte 'pīti ko viśeṣaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:320: tathā nīlādāvapariniṣṭhitanityānityabhāve kramākramau svadharmmiṇā sārdvaṃ ekajñānasaṃsargiṇau dṛṣṭau nitye 'pi yadi bhavataḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:321: nityagrāhiṇā jñānena svadharmmiṇā nityena sahaiva gṛhyeyātāmiti sambhāvanayā /
SA15bsa0553u:324: yāvatā kramākramakroḍīkṛtameva nityaṃ vikalpayāma iti cet /
SA15bsa0553u:328: tato nityatvasya kramākramikāryyaśakteśca parasparaparihārasthitalakṣaṇatayā durvvāro virodha iti kathaṃ nitye kramākramayorantarbhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:339: yadyādyaḥ pakṣastadā kramākramasyārthakriyāyāśca vyāptigrahaṇagocaravastuprativadvatvamapi na kṣīṇaṃ /
SA15bsa0553u:340: na ca dvitīye 'pi pakṣe doṣaḥ sambhavati /
SA15bsa0553u:344: paryyudāsavṛttyā budvisvabhāva bhūtā kṣaṇikākāre vastubhūte dharmmiṇi prativadvatvasambhavāt /
SA15bsa0553u:345: ayameva nyāyo na vaktā bandhyāsutaścaitanyābhāvādityādau yojyaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:346: etena yathā vṛkṣābhāvādityādyantarbhāvayituṃ śakyo na tathāyamiti trilocano 'pi nirastaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:356_0: tacca kramākrameṇa sattvasya vyāptisidvau sattvasya vyāpyasyābhāvena kramākramasya
SA15bsa0553u:356_1: vyāpakasya viraho vyāptaḥ sidhyatītyabhāvadharmmatvaṃ prāgeva vidhyorvyāptisādhakāt
SA15bsa0553u:357: na ca sattāyāmivāsattāyāmapi tulyaprasaṅgo bhinna nyāyatvāt /
SA15bsa0553u:362: asattāsādhane tvavastudharmmā heturavastuni vikalpamātrasidve dharmmiṇi nāśrayāsidvidoṣeṇa dūṣayituṃ śakyaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:370: tathā vikalpopanītasyaivākṣaṇika svarūpasya tat pratyanīkākāreṇa saha virodhavyavasthāyāṃ kīdṛśo doṣaḥ syāt /
SA15bsa0553u:375: na hi virodhonāma vastvantaraṃ kiñcit ubhayakoṭidattapādaṃ sambadvābhidhānamiṣyate 'smābhirupapadyate vā /
SA15bsa0553u:380: nāpyabhāvo bhāvarūpaṃ praviśatīti yo 'yamanayorasaṅkaraniyamaḥ sa eva pāramārthiko virodhaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:383: nanu nityatvakramayaugapadyavattvañca virudvau vidhūya nāparo virodhonāma /
SA15bsa0553u:386: na hi dharmmāntarasya sambhavena virodhasya pāramārthikatvaṃ brūmaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:387: kintu virudvayordharmmayoḥ sadbhāve 'nyathā virodhanāmadharmmāntarasambhave 'pi yadi na virudvau dharmmau kva pāramārthikavirodhasadbhāvaḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:388: virudvau ca dharmmau tāvataiva tāttviko virodhavyavahāraḥ /
SA15bsa0553u:392: hetoḥ svānubhavasya ca kṣatirataḥ kṣiptaḥ sapakṣo 'pi ca /
SA15bsa0553u:393: śūnyaśca dvitayena sidhyati na vā sattāpi sattāyathā
SA15bsa0553u:402: tataśca kṣaṇikākṣaṇikaparihāreṇa rāśyantarābhāvādakṣaṇikādvinivarttamānamidaṃ sattvaṃ kṣaṇikatva eva viśrāmyante na vyāptaṃ sidhyatīti sattvāt kṣaṇabhaṅgasidviṃravirodhinī //
